name: user_chat
description: Reply to user chat message when no function call matches the users query.

user_message.description: Message from the user. Example: 'Hello AI!'

user_query.description: The query provided by the user.

name: create_image
description: Generate an image from a prompt.

image_prompt.description: The prompt required to generate image.

name: video_player
description: Get a YouTube search query and play video in chat window.

search_string.description: The YouTube search string provided by the user.
